ing: 1/2 teaspoon curry powder, or more to taste
des: "Plain popcorn is an easy healthy snack, but it can be a little dull. If curry powder is not your thing, try chili powder or cinnamon sugar. Some kernels will remain unpopped."
ins:
Pour popcorn into the paper bag; fold top over several times to seal.
Heat in microwave until popping slows, about 2 minutes. Season popcorn with salt and curry powder; close bag and shake to evenly coat.
